name: Chairs
description: Family consists of a single mum with her 4 school-going children. She has just gotten her rental flat, and she is lacking some chairs. She has a small table that she can use as a dining table, but she doesn't have any chairs. Hence, they are hoping to get some chairs (minimum 5) so that their family can have meals together or even for the children to study at the table.

name: Single mattress
description: A single mother who has 4 school going children under her care. She struggles with mental health concerns and is unable to work, caring for her children as well. Family depends on government financial assistance and is unable to afford a new mattress. Their current mattress is no longer providing the support as the springs are protruding and causing discomfort. A few off her children sleeps on the same mattress with her while the rest sleeps in the living room on a sofa-bed (sharing). Kindly assist this family. Thank you.

passiton.name: Donation of Solid Wood Sofa Set (3+1+1) â€“ Jurong East
passiton.description:
I would like to bless and donate a solid wood sofa set (3-seater + two 1-seaters) in good, usable condition through the Pass-It-On programme.

Item details:

Origin: Zen Tradition

Material: Solid, heavy wood with firm cushion seats

Condition: Gently used, structurally strong, minor wear on fabric edges

Includes: Main seat cushions only (small decorative cushions in photo not included)

Colour: Beige-gold fabric with dark wood frame. I will also include an additional spare set of cushion covers in red too

Quantity: 1 set (3 + 1 + 1)


Pickup details:

Location: Jurong East (lift accessible)

Preferred collection: By end of Oct (flexible on timing)

I can assist with coordination for movers or charity pickup. By the way, need to arrange for movers because only my elderly parents in the house.
